name.ja: <ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>二<rt>に</rt></ruby><ruby>呪<rt>じゅ</rt></ruby><ruby>葬<rt>そう</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have a face-up High Dragon or Dragon Type monster on your field.

effect.en: You choose which of your monsters becomes the attack target for your opponent's attack. Then, if you have 2 or more face-up monsters with the same name on your field, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
